resources.string: This is the debug screen. However this text will dissapear when data arrives from the server.

--- BUG FIXES
*Changed .run command defaults for ordinal directions to a more adopted standard.

--- NEW FEATURES
*Added configuration editor for .run speedwalking command directions. 
MENU->More->Speedwalk Directions
*Added "close" and "clear" options to the .keyboard command.

Visit the website for more details!
http://bt.happygoatstudios.com

---- TEST VERSION 3 ----
*Prettied up the speedwalk configuration dialogs.
*Yet more validation for ; and , for invalid directions.

---- TEST VERSION 2 ----
*Added more validation to the configurable directions. Was not checking against existing run directions, now am.

--- TEST VERSION 1---
*Added configurable speedwalk directions.
See MENU->More->Speedwalk Directions
